title: Review and update README.md
scope: Review README.md against current repo structure and runtime configuration
Update README.md to reflect current features, endpoints, and build/deploy notes
Record changes in CHANGELOG.md once workorder is completed
acceptance_criteria: README.md reflects current repo layout, system components, and build steps
API endpoint list matches backend routes
Outdated marketing claims and paths are removed or corrected
CHANGELOG.md is updated when the documentation update is complete
risk_notes: Outdated README guidance can mislead developers and operators
rollback_plan: Revert the documentation changes and restore the previous version
